alert.note: Alert for Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 6:26PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Gadsden, northeastern Leon, southern Grady and southwestern Thomas Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 626 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles south of Cairo to 6 miles east of Havana. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Havana, Tallahassee, Freemont, Darsey, Moncrief, Lake Iamonia, Concord, Scotland, Orchard Pond, Rocky Hill, Gibson, Killearn Lakes, Miccosukee, Iamonia, Calvary, Moccasin Gap, Bradfordville, Hinson, Beachton and Metcalf. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
